00001 #include <num.h>
00002 
00003 /********************************************
00004  *
00005  * num-report.c
00006  *
00007  * Report by day, by agent type of network use.
00008  *  -U parameter sets modulo day.  If:
00009  *    U < 0, all reporting is off.
00010  *    U = 0, Network User Model is off, number
00011  *           of agents at home is reported as
00012  *           level 0.
00013  *    U > 0, Network User Model is run every
00014  *           U days.
00015  *  Default is U = 0.
00016  *
00017  * Columns:
00018  *   Day
00019  *   Agent type
00020  *   Percent at level 0 (above desired rate)
00021  *   Percent at level 1 (above 50%)
00022  *   Percent at level 2 (above 10%)
00023  *   Percent at level 3 (below 10%)
00024  *   Percent at level 4 (cannot connect)
00025  *   Total agents attempting to use network
00026  *   Total Agents achieving level 0
00027  *   Total Agents achieving level 1
00028  *   Total Agents achieving level 2
00029  *   Total Agents achieving level 3
00030  *   Total Agents achieving level 4
00031  *******************************************/
00032 
00033 void
00034 num_print(int today)
00035 {
00036         int             i,j;
00037         long int        total;
00038         long int        total_users = 0;
00039 
00040         for (i = 0; i < g_num_nprofiles; i++)
00041         {
00042                 total = 0;
00043                 for (j=0; j < NUM_LEVELS; j++)
00044                         total += g_num_level[i][j];
00045 
00046                 total_users += total;
00047 
00048                 fprintf(g_num_log_f, "%d %d", today, i);
00049 
00050 #if 0
00051                 if (g_num_nreport_days > 0)
00052                         fprintf(g_num_log_f, "%d %d", g_num_day-1, i);
00053                 else if(g_num_mod > g_num_day)
00054                         fprintf(g_num_log_f, "%d %d", g_num_day, i);
00055                 else
00056                         fprintf(g_num_log_f, "%d %d", g_num_day-g_num_mod, i);
00057 #endif
00058 
00059                 for(j = 0; j < NUM_LEVELS; j++)
00060                 {
00061                         if(total && g_num_mod > 0)
00062                         {
00063                                 fprintf(g_num_log_f, " %4.4lf", 
00064                                         100.0 * 
00065                                                 ((float) g_num_level[i][j] / 
00066                                                 (float) total));
00067                         } else if(g_num_nreport_days > 0)
00068                         {
00069                                 if (total)
00070                                         fprintf(g_num_log_f, " %4.4lf",
00071                                                 100.0 *
00072                                                 ((float) g_num_level[i][j] / 
00073                                                 (float) total));
00074                                 else
00075                                         fprintf(g_num_log_f, " 0.0000");
00076                         } else if(g_num_mod == 0 && g_num_profile_cnts[j])
00077                         {
00078                                 fprintf(g_num_log_f, " %4.4lf", 
00079                                         100.0 * 
00080                                                 ((float) g_num_level[i][j] / 
00081                                                 (float) g_num_profile_cnts[j]));
00082                         } else
00083                                 fprintf(g_num_log_f, " 0.0000");
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 if(g_num_mod > 0 || g_num_nreport_days > 0)
00087                         fprintf(g_num_log_f," %ld", total);
00088                 else
00089                         fprintf(g_num_log_f," %d", g_num_profile_cnts[i]);
00090                         
00091 
00092                 for(j = 0; j < NUM_LEVELS; j++)
00093                 {
00094                         // gnuplot isn't happy with zeros
00095                         if(j && total && !g_num_level[i][j])
00096                                 fprintf(g_num_log_f, " 0.001");
00097                         else
00098                                 fprintf(g_num_log_f, " %d", g_num_level[i][j]);
00099                 }
00100 
00101                 fprintf(g_num_log_f, "\n");
00102         }
00103 
00104         if(total_users > g_num_max_users)
00105                 g_num_max_users = total_users;
00106 
00107         for (i = 0; i < g_num_nprofiles; i++)
00108         {
00109                 for(j = 0; j < NUM_LEVELS; j++)
00110                         g_num_level[i][j] = 0;
00111 
00112                 g_num_net_pop[i] = 0;
00113         }
00114 
00115         fflush(NULL);
00116         fsync(fileno(g_num_log_f));
00117 }
00118 
00119 // Bunch of conditionals for print num.log
00120 // 1. only report for PREVIOUS day
00121 // 2. only first agent on a given day needs report
00122 // 3. only report if logging enabled
00123 // 4. only report after first MOD period expires
00124 // 5. only report every Nth day (g_num_mod)
00125 // Argh.
00126 //
00127 // Report previous day if g_num_nreport_days > 0
00128 // (Using Y option to say which days to report)
00129 void
00130 num_report_levels(int today)
00131 {
00132         // same day, different agent
00133         if(today <= g_num_day)
00134         {
00135                 if(g_num_report_days && 
00136                    g_num_day == g_num_report_days[g_num_next_report_day] && 
00137                    g_num_next_report_day < g_num_nreport_days+1)
00138                         g_num_next_report_day++;
00139 
00140                 return;
00141         }
00142 
00143         g_num_day = today;
00144 
00145         // log file off
00146         if(!g_num_log_f)
00147                 return;
00148 
00149         // only print every g_num_mod days
00150         if (g_num_mod == 0 && g_num_nreport_days == 0)
00151         {
00152                 num_print(today);
00153         } else if(g_num_nreport_days > 0)
00154         {
00155 #if VERIFY_NUM
00156                 printf("today: %d, g_num_report_days[%d]: %d\n",
00157                         today, g_num_next_report_day, 
00158                         g_num_report_days[g_num_next_report_day]);
00159 #endif
00160 
00161                 //if(g_num_day-1 == g_num_report_days[g_num_next_report_day])
00162                 {
00163                         num_print(g_num_report_days[g_num_next_report_day-1]);
00164 
00165                         if (g_num_next_report_day < g_num_nreport_days+1)
00166                                 g_num_next_report_day++;
00167                 }
00168         } else if((g_num_day+1) % g_num_mod == 0)
00169         {
00170                 num_print(g_num_day-g_num_mod);
00171         }
00172 }
